tags.description: Billing Engine products and offers and related operations
tags.name: Products and Offers

promotionCode.description: The promotion code that is going to the assigned to the customer

userEmail.description: The email of the customer to whom the promotion is going to be assigned

productFamily.description: Product family. Note if there are multiple service defintions with the same productFamily then the primary is used. See SLC for details.

sellerAccountId.description: Id specific to seller - eg: AWS Account Id

seller.description: The seller name. This value CANNOT be modified. This is to enforce Authz to ensure seller matches token and a seller is not trying to modify an order belonging to a different seller

onboardingContextId.description: A specific context id that refers to the service and additional metadata required for onboarding

locale.description: Locale to be presented, defaults to en_US. Supported values: en_US, ja_JP, ko_KR, de_DE, fr_FR, zh_TW, zh_CN, es_ES

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-values, not processed by VMware. NOTE: entire map will be replaced

orderCurrency.description: ISO 3-letter currency code that sets Org currency to this value. Note this currency-country mapping may differ from VMware mapping and depends on what is supported by seller

addresses.description: SHIPTO is required, if full address not provided customer will need to provide as part of VMware onboarding. NOTE: entire list will be replaced

companyName.description: The company purchasing this, will be use for Org name

authorizedEmails.description: User emails permitted to onboard with this link. NOTE: entire list will be replaced

expiryTtl.description: Validity duration. Expiration time is an ISO 8601 duration. Minimum duration is one minute. Maximum duration is 1year. Default duration value is 1 Year. Format spec: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations

migrationIds.description: If org is/was part of any migration(s) then those Migration ids

underMigration.description: If any of the migration(s) are currently NOT complete then this is true, otherwise false

orgContextValidations.description: List of reasons why the promo cannot be activated on the specified organization. relevant for AVAILABLE promotions only

serviceDefinitionId.description: The service definition ID that the org is subscribed to an offer of

subscriptionEndDateTime.description: When subscription will end, not applicable for ONDEMAND

currency.description: ISO Currency 3 letter code for subscription currency

context.description: A Map<String,String> that is persisted in CSP and returned when getting the subscription - this attribute is for the service's use and is not being used by CSP

promotions.description: List with users and associated promotion codes

serviceDefinitionId.description: The promotions will be associated with the given user on behalf of the service.If the value is not set the promotions will be given on behalf of the user making the request. Required if called by a service.

promotionCode.description: The Code to activate with the specified organization ID

userId.description: The User ID of the customer on behalf of whom the promotion will be applied

orgId.description: The organization ID to which the promo is applied

subscriptionComponents.description: List with the offers part of the subscription

serviceDefinitionDisplayName.description: Human readable name of the service

totalSalePrice.description: The total sale price for the subscription. Includes discount, but no taxes nor promo savings

totalDiscountSavings.description: The total savings from discounts for the subscription. Represented as negative value

totalNetAmount.description: The total net amount for the subscription

totalListPrice.description: The total price for the subscription. No taxes or promo savings should be applied

productIdentifierDescription.description: Human readable description of the product family

sellerAccountId.description: Id specific to seller - eg: AWS Account Id

onboardingUrlExpiryTtl.description: Duration of this URL. Format spec: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations

orderRegion.description: Region to be processed in. Eg us-west-1, gov-us-east-2 etc

sellerOrderId.description: Seller specific order reference number, optional

onboardingContextId.description: A specific context id that refers to the service and additional metadata required for onboarding

authorizedEmails.description: User emails permitted to onboard with this link

orderContract.description: Specific contract this order is for. Certain contracts will require specific processing, eg: JEDI requires Carahsoft in flow and based on this VMware will implement different workflows

onboardingUrl.description: opaque URL, provide to customer to start VMware onboarding flow. It is authorized for specific users mentioned in request

salesOrder.description: This is informational data for sales

locale.description: Locale to be presented, defaults to en_US. Supported values: en_US, ja_JP, ko_KR, de_DE, fr_FR, zh_TW, zh_CN, es_ES

orderCurrency.description: ISO 3-letter currency code that sets Org currency to this value. Note this currency-country mapping may differ from VMware mapping and depends on what is supported by seller

addresses.description: SHIPTO will be required and if not provided customer will need to provide as part of VMware onboarding

companyName.description: The company purchasing this, will be use for Org name

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-values, not processed by VMware

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

orgId.description: Org to fetch in context of

dataCenter.description: The offer data center if applicable to your Service

billingTermUom.description: Offer term uom, applicable only for COMMIT

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency, applicable only for COMMIT. For ONDEMAND is it always monthly in arrears

productId.description: If provided ONLY offers for that product id will be retrieved with further filtering based on additional attributes provided

name.description: The name of the offer (Exact Match on name is performed)

billingTerm.description: Offer term, applicable only for COMMIT

useOrgCurrency.description: if true AND orgId is provided then org currency is used

useOrgCountry.description: if true AND orgId is provided then org country is used

currency.description: ISO Currency 3 letter code for supported currencies. See orgId and useOrgCurrency to use Org values instead

effectiveDateTime.description: The point in time at which offer details are to be fetched. If not provided then current server time is used

onDemandOnly.description: if true then no further details are required

orderData.description: Arbitrary key-values. This provides data from TableA/TableB/TableC of order form. These keys would include for example: commitStartDate, commitEndDate, commitCurrency, commitAmount

hasServiceRestrictions.description: true if this seller has limits on services it can sell. If true then the permittedServiceDefinitionIds list is also populated. Currently will be false for VMware only

svgIcon.description: The SVG icon in base64 string.

permittedServiceDefinitionIds.description: If hasServiceRestrictions is true then list of Services that are allowed for this seller

additionalAttributes.description: Billing engine specific JSON payload that CSP does not process

billingEngine.description: The billing engine from where offers were retrieved

endOfLifeDateTime.description: If EOL lifecycleStatus then what is the date.

name.description: The name of the offer (Exact Match on name is performed)

description.example: A long Service Standard Offer description

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The time status happened change to this transaction

dataCenter.description: The offer data center if applicable to your Service

billingTermUom.description: Offer term uom, applicable only for COMMIT

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency, applicable only for COMMIT. For ONDEMAND is it always monthly in arrears

additionalAttributes.description: Billing engine specific JSON payload that CSP does not process

chargeType.description: Describes how the charge is applied, on a per unit basis, or flat fee or tiered

billingTerm.description: Offer term, applicable only for COMMIT

currency.description: ISO Currency 3 letter code for supported currencies

price.description: The price, not include at this level if chargeType is TIERED

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The time the change to this batch was made

attributes.example: For RCD: percent, groupCode, effectiveStartDateTime, effectiveEndDateTime

orgIds.description: The orgIds to migrate. Max size can be 100

fromEngine.description: Migrate fromEngine to toEngine. This value can only be SDP for Service call. Platform operator can call with SAP as well

toEngine.description: Migrate fromEngine to toEngine. This value can only be SAP for Service call. Platform operator can call with SDP as well

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

sellerAccountId.description: Id specific to seller - eg: AWS Account Id

onboardingContextId.description: A specific context id that refers to the service and additional metadata required for onboarding

locale.description: Locale to be presented, defaults to en_US. Supported values: en_US, ja_JP, ko_KR, de_DE, fr_FR, zh_TW, zh_CN, es_ES

salesOrder.description: This is informational data for sales

orderRegion.description: Region to be processed in. Eg us-west-1, gov-us-east-2 etc

orderContract.description: Specific contract this order is for. Certain contracts will require specific processing, eg: JEDI requires Carahsoft in flow and based on this VMware will implement different workflows

sellerOrderId.description: Seller specific order reference number, optional

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-values, not processed by VMware

orderCurrency.description: ISO 3-letter currency code that sets Org currency to this value. Note this currency-country mapping may differ from VMware mapping and depends on what is supported by seller

addresses.description: SHIPTO is required for onboarding, if provided here it will be used otherwise customer will need to provide it as part of VMware onboarding

companyName.description: The company purchasing this, will be use for Org name

authorizedEmails.description: User emails permitted to onboard with this link

expiryTtl.description: Validity duration. Expiration time is an ISO 8601 duration. Minimum duration is one minute. Maximum duration is 1year. Default duration value is 1 Year. Format spec: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations

orgId.description: OrgId to fetch in context of

dataCenter.description: The offer data center if applicable to your Service

customerSegment.description: A customer group that has common characteristics and is priced differently. Default is COMMERCIAL.

billingTermUom.description: Offer term uom, applicable only for COMMIT

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency, applicable only for COMMIT. For ONDEMAND is it always monthly in arrears

additionalAttributes.description: Billing engine specific JSON payload that CSP does not process

purchaseQuantity.description: Number to purchase, applicable only for COMMIT

billingTerm.description: Offer term, applicable only for COMMIT

chargeId.description: Offer charge id, applicable only for COMMIT

price.description: Applicable only for COMMIT. Does not apply if chargeType is TIERED. Price as returned by the offer, serves as an optimistic lock in case price has changed since it was retrieved

PromotionAssociationResponse.description: Result of association between promotions and users
PromotionAssociationResponse.title: PromotionAssociationResponse

charged.description: If this is prepaid subscription and it is charged this should be `true`, `false` otherwise. If set to `true`, then the `listPrice` and `promoSavings` should not be added to the subscription totals. The prepaid subscriptions should appear in the estimated charges as long as they are active and this flag should be set to `true`

discountSavings.description: A List of the DiscountSavings as part of the subscriptionDetails

listPrice.description: The price without taxes or promo savings applied

chargeDate.description: If `charged` is set to `true`, this field should be set to the date the customer is charged

billingStartDate.description: The start date of the subscription

productSkuDescription.description: Human readable description of the product
productSkuDescription.example: VMware Cloud on AWS - Software, Service, Computing and Storage A1 - Per i3 Host - Hourly Usage

billingEndDate.description: The end date of the subscription

activationDateTime.description: The start time of the subscription fulfillment time (for ACTIVATE only)

endDateTime.description: When the transaction ended processing. Will only be present in the end

startDateTime.description: When the transaction started processing. Will be not present initially

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The last time the was a change to this transaction
The last time the was a change to this step

startDateTime.description: When the step started processing. Will be not present initially

endDateTime.description: When the step ended processing. Will only be present in the end

additionalAttributes.description: Billing engine specific JSON payload that CSP does not process

serviceDefinitionId.description: The service definition ID that the org is subscribed to an offer of

context.description: A Map<String,String> that is persisted in CSP and returned when getting the subscription - this attribute is for the service's use and is not being used by CSP

endOfLifeDateTime.description: If EOL lifecycleStatus then what is the date.

additionalAttributes.description: Billing engine specific JSON payload that CSP does not process

billingEngine.description: The billing engine from where offers were retrieved

description.example: A long Service Standard Offer description

chargeId.description: Offer charge id, applicable only for COMMIT

effectiveDateTime.description: The point in time at which offer details are to be fetched.

promotions.description: List with users and associated promotion codes

serviceDefinitionId.description: The promotions will be associated with the given user on behalf of the service.If the value is not set the promotions will be given on behalf of the user making the request. Required if called by a service.

promotionCurrencyDetails.description: A list of multi-currency promo credits

status.description: The lifecycle status of the promo

thresholdAmount.description: The maximum amount that can be applied for the percentage specified. Displayed if the promoType is PERCENTAGE and if the threshold is specified.

applicableFor.description: The service(s) and the offer the promo is valid for

percentage.description: The percentage value defined for the given promotion. Displayed if the promoType is PERCENTAGE.

promotionLevel.description: The level at which the promotion is defined at

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

subscriptionIds.description: The CSP subscriptionIds to lookup, max length = 50

discountSavings.description: An aggregated list of discount savings

totalSalePrice.description: The total sale price for all subscriptions. Includes discount, but no taxes nor promo savings

promoSavings.description: The total savings from applied promotions for all subscriptions. Represented as negative value

statementPeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the statement those estimated charges are for

totalNetAmount.description: The total net amount for all subscriptions.

totalListPrice.description: The total price for all subscriptions. No taxes or promo savings are applied

totalPromoSavings.description: The total savings from applied promotions for all subscriptions. Represented as negative value

totalPayments.description: The current estimated costs. The total list price with the promo savings subtracted

currency.description: ISO Currency 3 letter code for the currency the estimated charges are in

statementPeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the statement those estimated charges are for

subscriptionDetails.description: The list with the subscriptions. The subscriptions are aggregated by the service display name

promoCode.description: The promotion code that is going to the assigned to the customer

userId.description: User ID (correspond to the "sub" claim of the ID/Access token)

success.description: Whether the association of the promotion code with the user was successful. The user will have the promotion assigned only if this is `true`

acct.description: The account identifier of the user (correspond to the "acct" claim of the ID/access token)

userEmail.description: The email of the customer to whom the promotion is going to be assigned

errorMessage.description: If the association of the promotion code with the user was not successful (`success` is `false`), the error message indicates why the association failed.  Present only if `success` is `false`.

promotionCode.description: The promotion code that is going to the assigned to the customer

userId.description: The User ID of the customer to whom the promotion is going to be assigned

sellerAccountId.description: The seller account id (eg: AWS account id), none if seller is VMWARE

promoCode.description: The code of the promotion applied

percentage.description: The percentage for percentage based promotions (promotion type is PERCENTAGE)

remainingAmount.description: The remaining amount of the promotional credit if the promotion type is AMOUNT and still active

savingAmount.description: The amount of the applied promotional credit. Represented as negative value

promoServiceDetails.description: A list with the services to which the promotion was applied

promoDescription.description: Human readable description of the promotion

promotionCode.description: The Code to activate with the specified organization ID

userEmail.description: The email of the customer on behalf of whom the promotion will be applied. It is replaced by acct (User Account Identifier) in v2 API.

orgId.description: The organization ID to which the promo is applied

subscriptionsMappings.description: The subscription id to billing engine subscription id orgMappings. Returned only if subscriptionIds was provided in the request

orgMappings.description: The org to billing engine orgMappings. Returned only if orgIds was provided in the request

attributes.example: For RCD: percent, groupCode, effectiveStartDateTime, effectiveEndDateTime

promoCode.description: The promotion code that is going to the assigned to the customer

userEmail.description: The email of the customer to whom the promotion is going to be assigned

success.description: Whether the association of the promotion code with the user was successful. The user will have the promotion assigned only if this is `true`

errorMessage.description: If the association of the promotion code with the user was not successful (`success` is `false`), the error message indicates why the association failed.  Present only if `success` is `false`.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The last time the was a change to this batch

migrationTransactions.description: Migration transactions, one for each org in request

startDateTime.description: When the batch started processing. Will be not present initially

endDateTime.description: When the batch ended processing. Will only be present in the end

additionalAttributes.description: Billing engine specific JSON payload that CSP does not process

uomTimeScale.description: Services may apply hour, day or month against UOM, such as Host-Hour, GB per month. Usage or consumption / second is currently not part of the standard

chargeId.description: The id of this usage item. Used in usage submission as well

uom.description: Each service may have its own UOM. Some services may use Host and others may use CPUs...etc

reasonCode.description: In case mapping is not found/error for provided subscription id
In case mapping is not found/error for provided org id

result.description: List of existing org billing statements for previous billing cycles.

requestMoreStatements.description: Flag which shows is there exists statements older than requested period. If it's true in current flow user can open support ticket to request them.

subscriptionIds.description: The subscriptionIds to lookup, max length = 50

orgIds.description: The orgIds to lookup, max length = 50

serviceDefinitionId.description: The service definition ID that the org is subscribed to an offer of

info.title: CSP Commerce APIs
info.description: A List of all commerce related APIs

get.summary: Return a list of payment methods associated to an Org
get.description:
For classified region supported fields are isDefault, paymentMethodId, paymentOptionId, creationDate, lastUpdateDate, paymentMethodSetterCn and for credit card payment method currency.
### Access Policy:
| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| Organization Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Service Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Managed Service Provider | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Read-only Operator | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Billing Read-only | ✔️ | ✔️ |

parameters.name: serviceDefinitionId
parameters.description: This is applicable only for Authorization of Service Owner role
If true then only default payment method is returned
parameters.name: defaultFlag

post.summary: Associate promotions to a list of customers
post.description:
null

| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| Service Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |

post.summary: Get offers applicable for a service-definition
post.description:
With this API you get a specific service offer from the billing engine mapped to the provided serviceDefintionId. For examples please see: https://confluence.eng.vmware.com/display/CSP/API+-+Products+and+Offers
### Access Policy:
| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| Organization Member | ✔️ | ❌ |
| Organization Owner | ✔️ | ❌ |
| Service Owner | ✔️ | ❌ |
| Read-only Operator | ✔️ | ✔️ |

Validate or Create a subscription. Please see: https://confluence.eng.vmware.com/display/CSP/API+%2D+Subscription
### Access Policy:
| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| Organization Owner | ✔️ | ❌ |
| Service Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action to perform. Current options: CREATE
